name: spiceblow-database
title: Spiceblow - Sql Database Management
description: Search, update, insert and delete rows in your Sql database, deeply integrated with AI
author: xmorse

commands.name: search-database
commands.title: Manage Database
commands.description: Search and update your PostgreSQL or MySQL database

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
